ygData.subject: Re: Summon Element Scroll
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Rondo ... Got the info in a post from GZ when all us magicians were complaining about not having pets past level 20 because research items were too rare.
ygData.messageBody:
> Who from Verant stated this? I have received a research component from
Rondo
> Dunfire in Crushbone, who is nowhere near 16. Well, maybe 12-14... maybe
> that is a unique experience though.

Got the info in a post from GZ when all us magicians were complaining about
not having pets past level 20 because research items were too rare. In the
post GZ said the percentage would be upped by 300%. He detailed a few other
things about research and one of them being that research starts at Lev 16
and hence only Lev 16+ monsters would drop components.

I guess there is a good chance this has changed, I must say I have killed
that little dwarf in Crushbone about 50 times and never got a component, but
I don't doubt what you say, and your right he is Level 12-14.

Regards,
Tremor of Bristlebain


P.S. This thread started as a whats a 'Summon Element Scroll'. I have since
found out that quite a few people have found just this as a drop from MOB's.
Some of them said where, and i've sort of concluded that any MOB that drops
components could drop this scroll. I guess they are just damn rare!!
